content: नैमित्तिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Produced by, connected with, or dependent on, any particular cause. {@--2@} Unusual, occasional, accidental, produced by some cause (<ab>opp.</ab> नित्य). --कः An astrologer, prophet. --कं {@--1@} An effect (<ab>opp.</ab> निमित्त ‘cause’); निमित्तनैमित्तिकयोरयं क्रमः <ls>Ś. 7. 30.</ls> {@--2@} An oceasional rite, a periodical ceremony.
